content: I was wondering if there is a rendered form of the MHD Profile IG available somewhere (I found the conformance resource themselves in the IHE FHIR GitHub repo). I could not find it on Simplifier and both links given in the MHD entry in the IG registry point to the IHE MHD wiki page. And are there perchance example resource available?

repo is https://github.com/IHE/ITI.MHD, ci build is here http://build.fhir.org/ig/IHE/ITI.MHD/branches/master/index.html, i submitted some examples, however they are not yet integrated https://github.com/IHE/ITI.MHD/pull/1 @John Moehrke can you have a look at the pull request?
That is a work-in-progress... all it contains today is the automatic rendering provided by the IG publisher. The normative text is still the IHE profile supplement
